suites.title: POST /login to get a valid authorization value

tests.title: Verify Success Login First
tests.fullTitle: POST /login to get a valid authorization value Verify Success Login First
tests.code:
const response = await request_url
    .post("/login")
    .send({ email: "shidqi.ngetes@gmail.com", password: "QaGabut100persen" });
    authorize_value = response.body.credentials.access_token; //update empty authorization with valid value
